game.title: The Lost Heirloom
game.description: Lord Radcliffe's prized family heirloom has been stolen from his estate. Travel to the nearby town of Oakshade and speak with the local blacksmith, Gideon, who may have some information about the theft.
game.reward: A priceless family heirloom and Lord Radcliffe's gratitude.

task.objective: Speak with Gideon in Oakshade about the missing heirloom.
task.description: Find and speak with Gideon, the local blacksmith in Oakshade, to gather more information about the stolen heirloom.
